SIDE EFFECTS FOR FORTICAL: I've taken both Fortical and the generic Calcitonin Salmon and have not experienced any side effects. The Fortical smelled a little pungent, but I got used to it.  For some reason the generic doesn't have that smell. I am very relieved to find a medication that I can tolerate so well.  Hopefully it will help with the bone loss.
One of the oldest and best meds for this condition....
